contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of March, 2014, the Emergency Application for Extraordinary Relief Pursuant to Pa.R.A.P. 3309, 42 Pa.C.S. § 726 and Kings Bench Power is hereby DENIED.
Justice McCAFFERY did not participate in this matter.
Chief Justice CASTILLE files a dissenting statement in which Justice STEVENS joins.
